All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Administrator
Administrator class is a subClass of ProfessionalUser.
BaseLogger
BaseLogger is a class for logging application info and error messages into respective text files.
BaseLogger.Error
 
BaseLogger.Info
 
Blurring
This class contains method to blur an image.
Brightness
The Brightness class applies a brightness filter to an ImageMatrix.
Contrast
The Contrast class applies a contrast filter to an ImageMatrix.
DiscoveryPage
DiscoveryPage is a JFrame that displays the posts shared by all users in a grid layout.
EdgeDetection
The EdgeDetection class applies an edge detection filter to an ImageMatrix.
FreeUser
FreeUser class is a subClass of User.
GrayScale
This class provides a grayscale filter for images.
HobbyistUser
HobbyistUser class is a subClass of User.
ImageMatrix
ImageMatrix is used to represent images.
ImageSecretary
ImageSecretary is used for basic I/O operations in terms of images.
LoginPage
LoginPage class represents the Login Page of the GUI application.
PhotoCloudApp
The main entry point of the PhotoCloud application.
PostPage
PostPage is a JFrame that displays the detailed view of a single post.
PostPage.Post
Post class represents a post object in the application.
ProfessionalUser
ProfessionalUser class is a subClass of User.
ProfilePage
This class represents a user's profile page in the application.
Sharpening
The Sharpening class provides a filter to sharpen images.
SignupPage
This class represents the Sign-up page of the application.
User
Abstract User class serves as a template for all user types.
